parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

parameters.name: author_exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sort collection by object attribute.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

parameters.name: categories_exclude
parameters.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

parameters.name: tags_exclude
parameters.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

parameters.name: sticky
parameters.description: Limit result set to items that are sticky.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

parameters.name: date_gmt
parameters.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: A named status for the object.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title for the object.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content for the object.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: The ID for the author of the object.

parameters.name: excerpt
parameters.description: The excerpt for the object.

parameters.name: featured_media
parameters.description: The ID of the featured media for the object.

parameters.name: comment_status
parameters.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object.

parameters.name: ping_status
parameters.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format for the object.

parameters.name: meta
parameters.description: Meta fields.

parameters.name: sticky
parameters.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: The theme file to use to display the object.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the object.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Site title.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Site tagline.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Site URL.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: This address is used for admin purposes, like new user notification.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: A city in the same timezone as you.

parameters.name: date_format
parameters.description: A date format for all date strings.

parameters.name: time_format
parameters.description: A time format for all time strings.

parameters.name: start_of_week
parameters.description: A day number of the week that the week should start on.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: WordPress locale code.

parameters.name: use_smilies
parameters.description: Convert emoticons like :-) and :-P to graphics on display.

parameters.name: default_category
parameters.description: Default post category.

parameters.name: default_post_format
parameters.description: Default post format.

parameters.name: posts_per_page
parameters.description: Blog pages show at most.

parameters.name: default_ping_status
parameters.description: Allow link notifications from other blogs (pingbacks and trackbacks) on new articles.

parameters.name: default_comment_status
parameters.description: Allow people to post comments on new articles.
